plot: A strange half-duck/half-baby escapes from his cot. He finds his wings hidden in the toy cupboard and flies up towards where the matches are stored. Will disaster occur?
title: Keep in a Dry Place and Away from Children
plot_es: A strange half-duck/half-baby escapes from his cot. He finds his wings hidden in the toy cupboard and flies up towards where the matches are stored. Will disaster occur?
original_name: Keep in a Dry Place and Away from Children
plot_en: A strange half-duck/half-baby escapes from his cot. He finds his wings hidden in the toy cupboard and flies up towards where the matches are stored. Will disaster occur?
